Sentencas: Gadolinium doped cerium (GDC10) thin film ceramics were prepared by evaporating Gd0.1Ce0.9O1.95 powder, using an e-beam evaporation technique.
Titulo: The structural and electrical properties of GDC10 thin films formed by e-beam technique

Sentencas: The initial powder of GDC10, with different surface areas (BET: 6.44, 36.2, 201 m(2)/g), were used to prepare thin ceramic films.
Titulo: The structural and electrical properties of GDC10 thin films formed by e-beam technique

Sentencas: The GDC10 thin ceramic films (thickness similar to 1.4 mu m) were formed on optical quartz substrate (substrate geometry 2.5 x 2.5 cm).
Titulo: The structural and electrical properties of GDC10 thin films formed by e-beam technique

Sentencas: The formed GDC10 thin ceramic films structural properties were studied using X-ray diffraction (XRD) and scanning electron microscopy (SEM).
Titulo: The structural and electrical properties of GDC10 thin films formed by e-beam technique

Sentencas: The electrical properties of the samples were investigated with an AC impedance spectroscopy in the temperature range 473-873 K and frequency range 10(-1)-10(6)
Titulo: The structural and electrical properties of GDC10 thin films formed by e-beam technique
The structural and electrical properties of GDC10 thin films formed by e-beam technique

Sentencas: The formed GDC10 thin films repeat the crystallographic orientation of evaporated powder and do not depend on the initial powder grain size and deposition rate.
Titulo: The structural and electrical properties of GDC10 thin films formed by e-beam technique

Sentencas: It was determined that crystallite size has an influence on conductivity and diffusion coefficient.
Titulo: The structural and electrical properties of GDC10 thin films formed by e-beam technique

Sentencas: The ionic conductivity and activation energy depends on crystallite size.
Titulo: The structural and electrical properties of GDC10 thin films formed by e-beam technique

Sentencas: The best ionic conductivity and the lowest activation energy are 9.00.10(-1) S/m and 1.13 eV, respectively.
Titulo: The structural and electrical properties of GDC10 thin films formed by e-beam technique

Sentencas: The activation energy varies from 1.19 to 1.29 eV, and depends on crystallite size, too.
Titulo: The structural and electrical properties of GDC10 thin films formed by e-beam technique
The structural and electrical properties of GDC10 thin films formed by e-beam technique
